trans-unit.source: Represents a control that contains multiple items that share the same space on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 表示包含共享相同的空间，在屏幕上的多个项的控件。

trans-unit.source: The TabControl is useful for minimizing screen space usage while allowing an application to expose a large amount of data.
trans-unit.target: TabControl 可用于将降至最低屏幕空间使用情况，同时允许应用程序公开大量的数据。

trans-unit.source: A TabControl consists of multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects that share the same screen space.
trans-unit.target: TabControl 由多个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>对象共享相同的屏幕空间。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> in a TabControl is visible at a time.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>在 TabControl 将显示一次。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>

trans-unit.source: When a user selects the tab of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>, the contents of that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> become visible and the contents of the other <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects are hidden.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择的选项卡<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>，该内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>变得可见和其他内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>对象中隐藏。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>

trans-unit.source: TabControl is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: TabControl 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，这意味着它可以包含的任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板） 的对象的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the TabControl Control To apply the same property settings to multiple TabControl controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: TabControl 控件到自定义适用于多个 TabControl 控件，使用的相同的属性设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控制。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the TabControl, see [TabControl Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于 TabControl 的状态，请参阅[TabControl 样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in TabControl control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在 TabControl 控件的默认模板中，通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabControl"></xref>.class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabControl"> </xref>。 类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> objects if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个复合字符串，指定如何格式化的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref>对象它们显示为字符串。

trans-unit.source: ContentStringFormat can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: ContentStringFormat 可以是预定义、 撰写的或自定义字符串格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, the ContentStringFormat property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>，ContentStringFormat 属性将被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> objects if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: 一个复合字符串，指定如何格式化的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref>对象它们显示为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentStringFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentStringFormat*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to apply to any <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*> property defined.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref>要应用于任何<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref>没有<> *1> 或<> *1> 定义属性。

trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 属性元素用法 # # XAML 值*ResourceExtension*以下项之一︰ `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *TemplateResourceKey* The key that identifies the template being requested.
trans-unit.target: *TemplateResourceKey*标识所请求的模板的键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 键指一种<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>中的现有资源

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 属性元素语法是从技术上讲是可行的但不是建议这样做。

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to apply to any <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref> that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate*> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelector*> property defined.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref>要应用于任何<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref>没有<> *1> 或<> *1> 定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> that provides custom logic for choosing the template that is used to display the content of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref> ，提供自定义逻辑以选择用于显示控件的内容的模板。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> when you have more than one <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to apply based on the properties of each data object.
trans-unit.target: 通常，你创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>时有多个<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>为同一类型的对象，并且您想要提供您自己逻辑来选择<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>将基于每个数据对象的属性。</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you have objects of different types, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否你有不同类型的对象，你可以设置<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>的时间为<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>。</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>属性</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do that, then there is no need to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你这样做，则无需创建一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a <xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger> or a data converter.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果你有相同类型的但具有不同的属性的对象，还可以考虑使用<xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>或数据转换器。</xref:System.Windows.DataTrigger>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> and override the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建一个模板选择器，创建一个类继承自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>并重写<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element.
trans-unit.target: 定义类后，你可以将类的实例分配给您的元素的模板选择器属性。

trans-unit.source: If both the ContentTemplateSelector and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A> properties are set, then this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个 ContentTemplateSelector 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A>设置属性，则将忽略此属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *ResourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 属性元素用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*ResourceExtension*以下项之一︰ `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested.
trans-unit.target: *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey*标识所请求的选择器实现的键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: 键指实现实用的派生类<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>重写。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically add an instance of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> class as a resource to a resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式添加的实例你<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>类作为资源的资源字典。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* A class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> and overrides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation*从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>和替代<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>派生的类

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md)。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A ContentTemplateSelector.
trans-unit.target: ContentTemplateSelector。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates or identifies the element used to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 创建或标识用于显示指定的项的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element used to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 用于显示指定的项的元素。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemContainer" name="ItemContainer" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否为指定的项 （或可以作为） 其自己<xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemContainer" name="ItemContainer" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specified item.
trans-unit.target: 指定的项。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is its own <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemContainer" name="ItemContainer" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该项是其自己<xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemContainer" name="ItemContainer" href=""> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called when <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate*> is called.
trans-unit.target: 时调用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate*>称为。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: This method updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties to the objects used by the currently selected <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法更新<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>，且<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A>对对象的属性使用的当前所选<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabControlAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供适当<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabControlAutomationPeer"></xref>实现此控件，作为的一部分[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]自动化基础结构。

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 特定于类型的<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>实现。

trans-unit.source: Called when <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized*> is set to **true**.
trans-unit.target: 时调用<> *1> 设置为* *true**。

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized%2A> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 该控件将引发<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized%2A>事件，通过调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[路由事件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Called to update the current selection when items change.
trans-unit.target: 调用以更新当前所选内容项更改时。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件数据<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user presses a key.
trans-unit.target: 提供类处理<xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown"></xref>用户按下某个键时发生的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when the user presses CTRL+TAB, CTRL+SHIFT+TAB, HOME, or END to navigate between <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将标记<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown>事件处理的设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性的事件数据的`true`当用户按下 CTRL + TAB、 CTRL + SHIFT + TAB，主页或最终间导航<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown> event data.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此实现不会更改已处理的状态 (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性) 的<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown>事件数据。</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties to the objects used by the currently selected <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>更新<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A>，且<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A>对对象的属性使用的当前所选<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.SelectedContent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 该控件将引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged>事件，通过调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[路由事件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the content of the currently selected <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前所选的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TabItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is updated to reference the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the active <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> when the tab selection changes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将更新为引用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>的活动<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>当选项卡上选择发生更改。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性将绑定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>到此属性的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: If you create a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>, be sure to the bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to this property by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to "SelectedContent" or by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如果你创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>，请确保绑定到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>通过设置此属性的属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设为"SelectedContent"或通过使用[TemplateBinding 标记扩展](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>
